channel.title: What do you dislike most about the game?
channel.description:
What do you dislike the most about Runescape and/or Jagex?
To me, it's just the community. It seems like I can't talk to anyone who doesn't seem to live in their own universe and thinks that they're the best in the game and when they loose a fight, they just go on a rampage saying how you cheated or Ddosed them or some shit.
This isn't a complaint or hate thread talking about how much I hate Jagex, I just want to know what people dislike about Runescape.

item.title: What do you dislike most about the game?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Seeing this thread on a Runescape emulation forum is quite contradictory.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you dislike most about the game?

item.title: What do you dislike most about the game?
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

JavaTC:

we need a decent developer team to write an actual stable base that will work. Even if all you want to do is pk, you should at least show interest in the details and the beauty of the original game.

emps-scape

Read full topic
item.source: What do you dislike most about the game?

item.title: What do you dislike most about the game?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:40, topic:430538”][quote author=Frell link=topic=533219.msg3898429#msg3898429 date=1327534786]

People who only complain about it. If you don’t like the game don’t play it.

Wrong, we complain about it being ruined. We sure as hell can be furious with the direction jagex has taken it.
[/quote]
And it’s never going to come back. Not worth bitching about things that won’t change. That’s the point of these forums, to recreate it for ourselves (well, that was the point, anyway).[/quote]
Yes, however I’m beginning to loose faith that that will ever happen with some of the new programmers coming in. All they do is leech a 2 year old source, make a PI, or ‘clean’ a source. We don’t need anything cleaned, we need a decent developer team to write an actual stable base that will work. Even if all you want to do is pk, you should at least show interest in the details and the beauty of the original game.

Also, I do agree that Jagex have made wrong turns, but I also feel the community pushed them into it in a way. Every update they made, people would say “wow dude dis sht suks lolloololollolololo”. Even if the update was good, people would still go on a selfish rampage on the forums asking for better content when it’s fine. They never realized that they are the only ones that dislike it, and therefore the only ones who rant. The 562 era was the time I knew the game would fail.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you dislike most about the game?

item.title: What do you dislike most about the game?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

The only thing I truly dislike is the community (although I can safely say that for almost every community). I miss the days when people actually talked when they fished or trained fletching or herblore. I miss when you weren’t called a bot for having a 99, but were actually respected in a sense. I miss when having something like a fire cape was amazing and everyone was jealous of you, but now people just think of a fire cape as nothing now. Oh the joys of the new generation…

Damn kids, get off my house portal.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you dislike most about the game?

item.title: What do you dislike most about the game?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I dislike all the sprite changes recently. They are disgusting. It seems that Jagex are trying to move away from the medievel theme - which sucks.

item.title: What do you dislike most about the game?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:22, topic:430538”][quote author=Frell link=topic=533219.msg3897715#msg3897715 date=1327459293]
The fact that jagex is pushing the style of making it look like a flash, plush, shiny, sabre-esque minigame.
[/quote]

This. Not to mention I can’t even play on my computer anymore because the lag due to the graphics settings is so bad. Even on minimum. Granted my computer is shit and I’m not investing in a laptop for a few months. Also many, many pointless updates that completely unbalance the combat triangle. Jagex should have realized that bigger is not always better.[/quote]I think I already said this a few times… I would be glad to remote desktop with you and help fix up your pc to run faster.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you dislike most about the game?

item.title: What do you dislike most about the game?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:22, topic:430538”][quote author=Frell link=topic=533219.msg3897715#msg3897715 date=1327459293]
The fact that jagex is pushing the style of making it look like a flash, plush, shiny, sabre-esque minigame.
[/quote]

This. Not to mention I can’t even play on my computer anymore because the lag due to the graphics settings is so bad. Even on minimum. Granted my computer is shit and I’m not investing in a laptop for a few months. Also many, many pointless updates that completely unbalance the combat triangle. Jagex should have realized that bigger is not always better.[/quote]

even in low, have you tryed updating your graphics card and java or getting a new graphics card somewhere? maybe clearing more space on your ram? such as disk clean-up, removing cookies, deleting folders and stuff that you don’t use anymore, removing programs you rarely use?

HMM… how about restore computer to factory settings! maybe that will solve it

Read full topic

item.title: What do you dislike most about the game?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

A few things but mostly peoples constant complaints about the game. Every game has its downsides, games need to evolve and change if it doesn’t produce sequels like Rs if yous never knew. Staying the same is backwards, they may make bad updates but they make good ones too.

However, I don’t like how theres not a lot of combination requirements, there needs to be more rather than just making requirements for things high in one skill. An example of somewhere they succeeded in this was Korasi as you needed to do skills and quests rather than making it like 95 att req or some shit.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you dislike most about the game?
